apps.name: Bloons TD 6
apps.subtitle: Mega Popular Tower Defense
apps.versionDescription:
The Adventure Begins!
- All new Odyssey Mode links maps together in epic challenges with big Trophy rewards
- Trophy Store! Use your Trophies from Odysseys and Races to get awesomer cosmetics for Monkeys, Bloons, Co-op, and more!
- The intoxicatingly fun new beginner map Lotus Island
- Tentacular goodness with the new Striker skin - Octojones
- Lots of bug fixes and balance changes
apps.localizedDescription: FREE money. By simply downloading apps.
